page.title: 17Migration to Godalming
page.content: The average number of years people had lived in Godalming was twelve. Most people moved here because of easy access to the place of work of the main wage earner. The second reason was that the people much preferred to live in this area even though the vast majority of them came from other parts of Surrey. They preferred the quieter, rural atmosphere, the friendliness and the close proximity of London and the south coast. Those few who did not like living in this area missed their friends. People also think this area is very convenient for both Heathrow and Gatwick airports. Some said more shopping facilities and car parks were needed.
